title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.2, Mistral, Gemma 2 and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent API, streaming, embeddings, list/pull models.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama; simple interface to chat, generate and manage local models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI (text UI) client for Ollama written in Rust; keyboard-driven chat.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack by deepset integration; use Ollama models for generative QA & RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, pull models with strongly-typed models.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker images and compose stacks for CPU/GPU inference.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain to chat with PDFs locally.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama model responses into channels or DMs.

title: ollama-npm-search
summary: NPM registry search listing 30+ community packages (ollama-js, ollama-ai, ollama-node, etc.).

title: ollama-pypi-search
summary: PyPI search showing official ollama package and 15+ integrations (ollama-chat, ollama-rag, etc.).

title: r/ollama - Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for Ollama news, model sharing and troubleshooting (30k+ members).

title: ollama-hacker-news
summary: Hacker News discussions around Ollama releases and local LLM trends.
